last_episode_to_air.name: Team's Song Theme Song
last_episode_to_air.overview: Sparks' Crew wants to make their own theme song, but they have no musical instruments. How can they find a way to make sounds of different pitches?

name: Hero Elementary
overview: Members of the Sparks' Crew -- Lucita Sky, AJ Gadgets, Sara Snap and Benny Bubbles -- work with their teacher, Mr. Sparks, to help people and solve problems.

episodes.name: Hatching a Plan
episodes.overview: When an egg hatches and an unfamiliar bird emerges, Sparks’ Crew vows to reunite the young bird with its parents. After some trial and error, they observe similarities and differences between young animals and their parents to find the baby bird’s family.

episodes.name: The Invisible Force
episodes.overview: When the decorations of a young girl’s birthday party are suddenly whisked away, Sparks’ Crew wonder if this is the work of InvisiGirl. But once investigating further, they learn that something more natural might be the cause of this mayhem.

episodes.name: Saved from the Bell
episodes.overview: When the bell on top of the school's Leaping Tower keeps ringing, Sparks' Crew plans and conducts an investigation. They discover that vibrations make sound, but what's causing the bell to vibrate and ring?

episodes.name: The Right Stuff
episodes.overview: When Sparks' Crew decides to restyle their current hero suits, they have to figure out what materials they can use. But, is it the right stuff to help them save the day?

episodes.name: Tail of One Kitty
episodes.overview: The crew learns how animals use their tails when it tries to rescue a little girl's kitten

episodes.name: Movie Theater Meltdown
episodes.overview: The team helps a teen with an out-of-control superpower.

episodes.name: The Lake Mistake
episodes.overview: On a warm day, the team takes a field trip to the lake. A fellow super student accidentally freezes the entire lake!

episodes.name: Plant Problem
episodes.overview: A Turbo Grow ray zaps a plant and it grows out of control all over Citytown. Sparks' Crew comes to the rescue!

episodes.name: Where’s Fur Blur
episodes.overview: The heroes can't find Fur Blur. Sparks' Crew uses their five senses to track her throughout the school.

episodes.name: The Blob
episodes.overview: A giant, mysterious blob invades the hallways and classrooms. Sparks' Crew must identify the properties of The Blob to stop it!

episodes.name: Toadal Confusion
episodes.overview: When toads take over a new skate park, Sparks' Crew must help the toads get to their natural habitat.

episodes.name: Hero Hideaway
episodes.overview: AJ tries to make a hero clubhouse out of cardboard boxes, but it keeps falling. Is there a better way to build it?

episodes.name: All Over the Map
episodes.overview: A bird takes AJ's twigcam and flies off with it while it is still sending footage of its flight.

episodes.name: Lights Go Down in City Town
episodes.overview: Sparks' Crew is looking forward to seeing a meteor shower, but the nighttime sky is too bright from the lights of the city!

episodes.name: Fair Weather
episodes.overview: It's the day of the Hero Elementary Fun Fair, but the weather keeps changing! Sparks' Crew learns how to recognize the signs of changing weather.

episodes.name: Home Sweet Home
episodes.overview: When a tree falls in the schoolyard, the heroes try to find a new home for a chipmunk!

episodes.name: The Feed for Speed
episodes.overview: The class pet, Fur Blur, is competing in the school's Super Pet Races. Then, AJ invents a robot that can do everything…except get up stairs!

episodes.name: An Uphill Task
episodes.overview: Sparks' Crew must determine how to get the robot up the stairs in time for the Invention Fair.

episodes.name: With a Little Push
episodes.overview: Sparks' Crew chases a giant ball through Citytown. To save the day, the team uses hands-on investigation and learns that pushing an object can start or stop its movement.

episodes.name: Track That Pack
episodes.overview: AJ's backpack has floated away in a lake. By navigating the connecting bodies of water, Sparks' Crew works together to find his pack.

episodes.name: The Butterfly Chasers
episodes.overview: When Monarch butterflies are missing from the school garden, Benny and the rest of Sparks' Crew follow one Monarch to see where it goes.

episodes.name: Something Shady
episodes.overview: Then, the shady spot that AJ picked for the class's outdoor lunch disappeared. Who swiped AJ's shade?

episodes.name: Turtle Beach
episodes.overview: Sparks' Crew travels to Turtle Beach to see baby turtles hatching, but instead they find the beach filled with litter. The heroes investigate how the garbage got there.

episodes.name: Shine a Light on Me
episodes.overview: Sparks' Crew gathers at night to search for a missing superdog!

episodes.name: Sound of Ice Cream
episodes.overview: When an ice cream truck is accidentally made invisible, Sparks' Crew must rely on the sound of the truck's music to track and find it.

episodes.name: The Reflection Connection
episodes.overview: When a flying super-glue-gadget goes haywire, people everywhere get stuck!

episodes.name: Sparks' Unplugged
episodes.overview: When muffins go missing from the school cafeteria kitchen, Sparks' Crew tries to solve the mystery.

episodes.name: Camp Catastrophe
episodes.overview: When a scout troop's tent blows away, Sparks' Crew helps them build a new shelter.

episodes.name: Monster Hunters
episodes.overview: When someone calls on Sparks' Crew to help with a backyard "monster," the team discovers that it's a mother opossum and her babies!

episodes.name: A Soapy Situation
episodes.overview: The automated floor cleaning machine at the Super-Duper store is a sudsy mess!

episodes.name: Bugging Out
episodes.overview: Sparks' Crew is accidentally shrunk to the size of bugs and must find their way out of an overgrown, weedy area.

episodes.name: Eager Beavers
episodes.overview: Sparks' Crew comes to the rescue of Lucita's grandmother when her favorite scenic spot becomes flooded.

episodes.name: A Leg Up
episodes.overview: When a baby porcupine gets itself into predicaments, it's Sparks' Crew to the rescue! Then, Fur Blur has come down with "Sneezitis," a hamster cold.

episodes.name: Sneezitis Solution
episodes.overview: Sparks' Crew rushes her to the Citytown Greenhouse to find a plant which will cure her!

episodes.name: What You Don't See
episodes.overview: A frightened horse is on the loose in Citytown, and Sparks' Crew tries to help catch it!

episodes.name: Super Purple Pop-Up Plants
episodes.overview: Then, Sparks' Crew investigates mysterious purple plants that keep popping up all over Citytown.

episodes.name: A Dog in the Fog
episodes.overview: When a little dog gets lost in the fog, it's Sparks' Crew to the rescue!

episodes.name: Bye, Bye Dragonfly
episodes.overview: AJ's Dragonfly Drone flies away on its own, and Sparks' Crew sets off on a mission to catch it!

episodes.name: Rough Sledding
episodes.overview: When AJ accidentally ruins a schoolmate's box sled, Sparks' Crew pitches in to help find and test the right material to repair the sled.

episodes.name: Hungry Hungry Hoppers
episodes.overview: Sparks' Crew takes care of someone else's class pet, a super frog that can leap high and far!

episodes.name: Hero Hit Parade
episodes.overview: When a big parade balloon gets loose and flies through Citytown, Sparks' Crew tries to get it back.

episodes.name: Trouble at the Pet Wash
episodes.overview: Sparks' Crew is setting up a pet wash when a young boy's dog goes missing. The Sparks' Crew sets out to search for it!

episodes.name: Bouncing Ideas
episodes.overview: Hero Elementary student Rubberband Robbie is stretchy! When he coils up into a ball and bounces around school, Sparks' Crew must stop him!

episodes.name: Leaning Tower, No Pizza
episodes.overview: Lucita accidently causes a communications tower to fall over while flying to pick up pizza.

episodes.name: Kite Delight
episodes.overview: When a young boy's kite is ruined, Sparks' Crew tries to help him make a new kite.

episodes.name: Little Lost Horse
episodes.overview: When a little girl loses a toy horse on a beach, Sparks' Crew comes to the rescue!

episodes.name: The Crew Who SNOWS What to Do
episodes.overview: Turbo Tina is excited for her first snowfall! When some of the snow melts quickly, can Sparks' Crew figure out why?

episodes.name: Keep Your Eye on the Ball
episodes.overview: The Sparks' Crew must come up with an alternative when all the balls go missing during a t-ball championship game.

episodes.name: Going to Pieces
episodes.overview: When a piece of a statue breaks off, Sparks' Crew tries to find it in time for the statue's unveiling ceremony.

episodes.name: Forces of Nature
episodes.overview: Sparks' Crew tries to find an invention that Dr. Inventorman buried underground years ago!

episodes.name: Knot So Fast
episodes.overview: AJ invents "The Lacer Racer," a shoe-tying car.

episodes.name: Made in the Shade
episodes.overview: When the ice cream in Stevie Heat's ice cream cart melts, Sparks' Crew investigates how this could happen and what they can do to make sure it doesn't happen again.

episodes.name: Snowy Journey
episodes.overview: On a cold winter morning, Fur Blur isn't her usual self. Sparks' Crew takes her to see a veterinarian.

episodes.name: Super Summertime
episodes.overview: AJ wants to do all the activities on his list, but it's summertime and his list is filled with winter activities!

episodes.name: Hail Caesar
episodes.overview: When a hailstorm causes damage around Citytown, Sparks' Crew calls upon the famous hero, Hail Caesar, to help them understand more about hail.

episodes.name: Picture Perfect
episodes.overview: Then, it's picture day at Hero Elementary, and Sparks' Crew is determined to stay clean. Their mission involves rescuing someone whose scooter is stuck in a giant mud puddle.

episodes.name: Monumental Problem
episodes.overview: When a nose accidentally breaks off one of the faces on Hero Hill, the heroes must figure out how to repair the monument.

episodes.name: Super Lift
episodes.overview: Then, Sparks' Crew tries to help change a broken wheel on a hot dog cart. But with Sara playing "teacher" for the day, how can they lift the heavy cart without her so they can change the wheel?

episodes.name: Looking Super
episodes.overview: When a self-flying cape escapes from the store selling it, Sparks' Crew teams up with the famous hero, Hail Caesar, to search for it.

episodes.name: Schmubble Trouble
episodes.overview: Benny has a case of the "Schmubbles," a bubble cold that causes bubbles to shoot out of his hands uncontrollably!

episodes.name: Sara Loses her Snap
episodes.overview: Sara loses her superpowers on the same day that Sparks' Crew must move a giant, heavy burger. How can they move it without Sara's super strength?

episodes.name: A Soupie Mystery
episodes.overview: A mysterious creature is sighted in Super Superior Lake. Sparks' Crew sets out to find "Soupy," but they must find reliable information to determine what this creature could be.

episodes.name: AJ's Extra Superpower
episodes.overview: When a little girl's toys keep disappearing from her backyard, Sparks' Crew discovers the culprit is a neighbor's dog. How will they keep it out? AJ's Extra Superpower is the key.

episodes.name: Search and Rescue
episodes.overview: Sparks' Crew is on a training mission to find their schoolmates who are hiding somewhere in Citytown! Then, the kids are shocked to see their teacher on the weekend outside of school.

episodes.name: Secret Lives of Teachers
episodes.overview: When Mr. Sparks loses an important package, the heroes must save the day without the use of the superhero technology they usually have with them on school days!

episodes.name: Heroes in Space
episodes.overview: Sara is excited to celebrate the full moon viewing with her hero friends, but they notice that half the moon seems to be gone!

episodes.name: Back on Track
episodes.overview: When a toy train display featuring a model replica of City Town is ruined, Sparks' Crew sets out to learn more about the landforms that make up City Town and to help rebuild a new replica.

episodes.name: Switcheroo-er
episodes.overview: AJ invents a gadget that switches everyone's powers!

episodes.name: Squeak to Me
episodes.overview: AJ builds a gadget to help people understand Fur Blur's squeaks, but the gadget misfires and makes people squeak instead of talk!

episodes.name: Team's Song Theme Song
episodes.overview: Sparks' Crew wants to make their own theme song, but they have no musical instruments. How can they find a way to make sounds of different pitches?
